```{r}
url <- "https://s3.amazonaws.com/capitalbikeshare-data/202109-capitalbikeshare-tripdata.zip"

download.file(url, destfile = "./capitalshare.csv.zip", mode = "wb")
unzip("./capitalshare.csv.zip")

capitalshare <- read_csv("202109-capitalbikeshare-tripdata.csv")
```
